I am an advisor at Indonesian National Economic Council (Dewan Ekonomi Nasional, DEN). I lecture at Universitas Indonesia and a senior fellow at Center for Indonesian Policy Studies (CIPS).

I regularly contribute to [East Asia Forum](https://eastasiaforum.org/author/krisna-gupta/) and [The Conversation Indonesia](https://theconversation.com/profiles/krisna-gupta-1133995)

I spent my free time playing some games and guitars. Do check my twitter and blog (mostly in Indonesian).

## Affiliations

- Advisor at Indonesian Economic Council
- Lecturer at Universitas Indonesia
- Senior fellow at Center for Indonesian Policy Studies [(CIPS)](https://www.cips-indonesia.org/about)

## Educations

- Ph.D. in economics from Crawford School of Public Policy, Australian National University [(ANU)](https://crawford.anu.edu.au/people/phd/krisna-gupta)
- M.S.E. in economics from Universitas Indonesia (Joint-degree with VU)
- M.Sc. in economics from VU University Amsterdam (joint-degree with UI)

## Research interest

- Industry / manufacturing growth (TFP, competition, export & output growth).

- Trade & industrial policies (tariff, trade agreements, LCR/TKDN, export ban, subsidies).

- The environmental impact of trade.

- Macroeconomic policy and trade.
